languages.text: "Не еретики мы!" {n}Изможденный мужчина почти плачет.{/n} "Мы беженцы! {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} клянусь — мы верно служили {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}, пока нас не бросили! Где защитники, что должны были уберегать земли Человечества от кошмаров? Предатели! Предатели и еретики они все!"

traits.locale_text: "Не еретики мы!" {n}Изможденный мужчина почти плачет.{/n} "Мы беженцы! Золотым Троном клянусь — мы верно служили Империуму, пока нас не бросили! Где защитники, что должны были уберегать земли Империума от кошмаров? Предатели! Предатели и еретики они все!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"
languages.original_text: "Не еретики мы!" {n}Изможденный мужчина почти плачет.{/n} "Мы беженцы! {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} клянусь — мы верно служили {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}, пока нас не бросили! Где защитники, что должны были уберегать земли Человечества от кошмаров? Предатели! Предатели и еретики они все!"

I swear it on the Golden Throne — we served the Imperium faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of the Imperium from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: 「我々は異端者ではない！」{n}みすぼらしい男が今にも泣きそうな表情で言う。{/n}「俺たちは難民だ！{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に誓って言う――俺たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に忠実に尽くしたのに、彼らは我々を見捨てたんだ！悪夢から人類の土地を守るはずの守護者たちはどこに消えた？裏切り者め！全員裏切り者で、異端者じゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々は異端者ではない！」{n}みすぼらしい男が今にも泣きそうな表情で言う。{/n}「俺たちは難民だ！{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に誓って言う――俺たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に忠実に尽くしたのに、彼らは我々を見捨てたんだ！悪夢から人類の土地を守るはずの守護者たちはどこに消えた？裏切り者め！全員裏切り者で、異端者じゃないか！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: “我们不是异端分子！”{n}那个面容憔悴的男人快要哭出来了。{/n}“我们是难民！我以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}发誓！我们忠诚地为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}服务，可他们却任由我们自生自灭！那些人本该保护我们，保护人类不受噩梦侵扰，可他们现在在哪里？那些叛徒！他们才是叛徒！他们才是异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: “我们不是异端分子！”{n}那个面容憔悴的男人快要哭出来了。{/n}“我们是难民！我以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}发誓！我们忠诚地为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}服务，可他们却任由我们自生自灭！那些人本该保护我们，保护人类不受噩梦侵扰，可他们现在在哪里？那些叛徒！他们才是叛徒！他们才是异端分子！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: «¡No somos herejes!». {n}El hombre demacrado está al borde de las lágrimas.{/n} «¡Somos refugiados! Lo juro por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¡Servimos fielmente al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} hasta que nos dejaron a nuestra suerte! ¿Dónde estaban los protectores que debían erradicar las pesadillas de las tierras de la Humanidad? ¡Traidores! ¡Los traidores y los herejes son ellos!».
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No somos herejes!». {n}El hombre demacrado está al borde de las lágrimas.{/n} «¡Somos refugiados! Lo juro por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¡Servimos fielmente al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} hasta que nos dejaron a nuestra suerte! ¿Dónde estaban los protectores que debían erradicar las pesadillas de las tierras de la Humanidad? ¡Traidores! ¡Los traidores y los herejes son ellos!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: « Nous ne sommes pas des hérétiques ! {n}s'exclame l'homme épuisé, les larmes aux yeux.{/n} Nous sommes des réfugiés ! Je le jure sur le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} : nous avons servi l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} loyalement jusqu'à ce qu'il nous abandonne à notre triste sort ! Où étaient nos protecteurs quand nous avions besoin d'eux pour repousser les cauchemars qui envahissaient les terres des humains ? Traîtres ! Ce sont des traîtres et des hérétiques, tous autant qu'ils sont ! »
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne sommes pas des hérétiques ! {n}s'exclame l'homme épuisé, les larmes aux yeux.{/n} Nous sommes des réfugiés ! Je le jure sur le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} : nous avons servi l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} loyalement jusqu'à ce qu'il nous abandonne à notre triste sort ! Où étaient nos protecteurs quand nous avions besoin d'eux pour repousser les cauchemars qui envahissaient les terres des humains ? Traîtres ! Ce sont des traîtres et des hérétiques, tous autant qu'ils sont ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Wir sind keine Ketzer!" {n} Der hagere Mann ist den Tränen nahe.{/n} "Wir sind Flüchtlinge! Ich schwöre beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} – wir haben dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} treu gedient, bis es uns im Stich gelassen hat! Wo waren die Beschützer, die die Ländereien der Menschheit vor Albträumen bewahren sollten? Verräter! Verräter und Ketzer, allesamt!"
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind keine Ketzer!" {n} Der hagere Mann ist den Tränen nahe.{/n} "Wir sind Flüchtlinge! Ich schwöre beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} – wir haben dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} treu gedient, bis es uns im Stich gelassen hat! Wo waren die Beschützer, die die Ländereien der Menschheit vor Albträumen bewahren sollten? Verräter! Verräter und Ketzer, allesamt!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Kâfir değiliz biz!" {n}Bitkin durumdaki adam, ağlamamak için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "Mülteciyiz! {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} yemin olsun ki inançla {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} hizmet ettik! Ta ki bizi dımdızlak bırakana kadar! İnsanlığın topraklarını kâbuslardan korumakla görevli olanlar neredeydi? Asıl hain, asıl kâfir olan onlar!"
languages.original_text: "We're not heretics!" {n}The haggard man is on the verge of tears.{/n} "We're refugees! I swear it on the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} — we served the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} faithfully until they hung us out to dry! Where were the protectors that were meant to shield the lands of Humanity from nightmares? Traitors! Traitors and heretics, the lot of them!"

traits.locale_text: "Biz kâfir değiliz!" {n}Bezgin durumdaki adam ağlamamak için kendini zor tutuyor gibi.{/n} "Biz sığınmacıyız! {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'a yemin ederim, bizi dımdızlak bırakana kadar tüm inancımızla {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'a hizmet ettik! İnsanlığın topraklarını kâbuslardan korumakla görevli olanlar neredeydi? Hainler! Hainler ve kâfirler! Hepsi öyle!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee
